title: Hour 3 - Kyrie Irving to the Lakers is Inevitable!
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Kyrie Irving to the Lakers is Inevitable!
description:
Jason Smith and Mike Harmon are in for Dan Patrick and the Danettes on this very special 4th of July. Jeanie Buss sends out a very cryptic tweet about Kobe Bryant and the guys try and dissect every portion of it. Jason was right about something about the Stranger Things finale! Plus, LA Times & Lakers Insider Dan Woike joins Jason and Mike to discuss Kyrie to the Lakers rumors and Jeanie Buss’ late night tweet!

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
